doc.after: Because of its multitude of diverse sometimes competing ethno linguistic groups Nigeria prior to independence has been faced with sectarian tensions and violence This is particularly a major issue in the oil producing Niger Delta region where both state and civilian forces employ varying methods of coercion in attempts gain control over regional petroleum resources Some of the ethnic groups like the Ogoni have experienced severe environmental degradation due to petroleum extraction
